info.title: SMRT Link Services for SMRT Link 11.1.0

get.description: Get the SMRT Link System Status containing system metadata, such as SL System Id, uptime and status message.

default.description: Failed to get Server status likely means the server is down

get.description: Retrieve swagger file contents
From the header JWT, convert to a UserRecord
Get a list of general user params

post.description: Set a list of user param key/values

get.description: Get a specific user param by key name

delete.description: Remove a user param by key name

get.description: Get a list of notifications newer than a number of days

parameters.name: newerThan
parameters.description: Number of days back to search

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: SMRT Link record ID (such as run design)

post.description: Add a new notification

get.description: Returns a log file from the default log folder
Returns a list of all installed components with version information
Returns an object describing a specific installed component
Return a list of files in specified server path
Retrieve information about available disk space
Retrieve information about available disk space for specified resource

post.description: Record user acceptance of tech support agreement

get.description: Retrieve history of user agreement acceptances
Retrieve user agreement acceptance record for specified version

put.description: Update the configuration (enable Job & Install Metrics) for specified SMRT Link version

delete.description: Delete an previously accepted user agreement acceptance record for specified version

200.description: Message of the Success of deleting the user acceptance record

200.description: SMRT Link System Alarm Status by Id

post.description: Log a message to the server

delete.description: Delete a run record by ID

Retrieve an existing run XML record by ID

200.description: List of collections associated with a run

Get a list of barcoded samples associated with a collection

delete.description: Delete all barcoded samples associated with a collection

Create a new Run Design from CSV table

Retrieve a list of registry resources

get.description: Get a list of all registered bundles (active or inactive) in the system

parameters.name: includeAll
parameters.description: If set to true, all records will be returned (including bundles flagged as ignored)

default.description: Unable to get bundle service. Bundle service is down

post.description: Add a new bundle to the system from a URL that points to a tgz file

default.description: Unable to download bundle or bundle is malformed

200.description: Returns a PacBio Data Bundle that was successfully added to the registry

get.description: Get a list of all registered bundles by bundle type (active or inactive) in the system

parameters.name: includeAll
parameters.description: If set to true, all records will be returned (including bundles flagged as ignored)

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: List of PacBio Data Bundles for provide bundle type

get.description: Get the PacBio Data bundle that is active for provided bundle type

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: Get the currently Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type

get.description: Get the a data file from an Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. The mimetype will be inferred from the file extension

parameters.description: URL encoded Relative Path to file in the bundle. For example 'SampleCalculatorParams.json' or 'definitions/PacBioAutomationConstraints.xml'
parameters.name: relativePath

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type. Or relative Path doesn't exist in bundle

200.description: Get the currently Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. Returns Null if no bundle is provided

get.description: Get the a data file from an Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. The mimetype will be inferred from the file extension.  The wildcard should be filled in with the relative path, for example 'SampleCalculatorParams.json' or 'definitions/PacBioAutomationConstraints.xml'.
get.x-comment: this is synonymous with the previous endpoint, except in a format KrakenD can handle

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type. Or relative Path doesn't exist in bundle

200.description: Get the currently Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. Returns Null if no bundle is provided

get.description: Get the PacBio Data bundle that is most recent version for provided bundle type

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: List of PacBio Data Bundles for provide bundle type

get.description: Get a PacBio Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion)

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

get.description: Download a PacBio Data Bundle TGZ by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion). User should explicitly set 'Accept:application/x-tar' header as this is the only output currently supported.

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

post.description: Upgrade (i.e., 'Activate') a specific Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion). This will mark the bundle as Active and mark other Data bundles as inActive

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

post.description: Upgrade (i.e., 'Activate') a specific Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion). This will mark the bundle as Active and mark other Data bundles as inActive

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

post.description: For a bundle that references an external file e.g. from S3, start a job to download the file, or return an already run job.

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

get.description: For a bundle that references an external file e.g. from S3, get the datastore file corresponding to that download if it exists

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find a downloaded file

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

post.description: Mark a specific data bundle by id (bundleType, bundleVersion) as ignored, preventing it from appearing as an update.

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

post.description: Un-mark a specific data bundle by id (bundleType, bundleVersion) as ignored, allowing it to appear as an update.

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

get.description: Check for an upgrade for a specific PacBio Bundle type version

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle with type `bundleType`

200.description: PacBid Data Bundle Upgrade. If null, there is no upgrade available

post.description: Send SMRT Link an SmrtLinkEvent

get.description: Get a Summary of each DataSet MetaType. Each model will have the 'short' name of the DataSet MetaType that is accessible at datasets/{ds-metatype}
Get a list of jobs having the dataset given by {uuid} as an entry-point

parameters.description: Either the UUID or the DataSet Int Id for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: dataset-id

get.description: Get a list of jobs having the dataset given by {uuid} as an entry-point

parameters.description: Either the UUID or the DataSet Int Id for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: dataset-id

get.description: Return a dataset if found,or empty object

200.description: Either a DataSetMetaDataSet object if found, or empty response

get.description: Get the metadata for a dataset

parameters.description: Either the UUID or the DataSet Int Id for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: dataset-id

parameters.description: Either the DataSet Metatype or DataSet Int or UUID for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: dataset-id

get.description: Either the DataSet Metatype (e.g, subreads to return a list of Datasets by metadata type) or Int or UUID for DataSet to get a DataSet Service MetaData for the requested dataset.

200.description: List of dataset records of this type.  See the type-specific endpoints for retrieving individual datasets for response schemas

parameters.description: Either the DataSet Metatype or DataSet Int or UUID for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: typeOrId
limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of datasets returned.  Default = 10000

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: The offset of the number of records to return

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: DataSet id Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: DataSet name String QueryFilter e.g., 'alpha' or 'in:alpha,beta'

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: DataSet path String QueryFilter e.g., '/path/to/dataset.xml' or 'in:/alpha.xml,/beta.xml' Note, these need to be URL encoded

parameters.name: numRecords
parameters.description: DataSet numRecord Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: totalLength
parameters.description: DataSet totalLength Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: DataSet version String QueryFilter e.g., '3.0.1' or 'in:3.0.1,4.1.0'

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: DataSet createdBy String QueryFilter e.g., 'ralph' or 'in:Steve,ralph'

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: DataSet jobId Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: DataSet projectId Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: DataSet createdAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: DataSet createdAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: importedAt
parameters.description: DataSet imported at DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: DataSet isActive QueryFilter e.g., 'isActive=true' 'isActive=false'. By default only active (i.e., non-soft-deleted) datasets are returned

parameters.name: parentUuid
parameters.description: DataSet Parent UUID Optional QueryFilter e.g., 'bed09210-272b-11e8-b223-e3d877ad877e' or 'in:bed09210-272b-11e8-b223-e3d877ad877e,ca234090-272b-11e8-abef-0773aed21b78' or ?parentUuid=null This will return parent datasets (i.e, no children datasets are returned)

parameters.name: numChildren
parameters.description: DataSet numChildren Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7' Using numChildren=0 will only return Children datasets, whereas numChildren:gt:0 will return only parent datasets

parameters.name: rawText
parameters.description: If defined, this string will be used to perform a case-insensitive full-text search over the JSONified query results

parameters.name: sortDescending
parameters.description: Sort in descending order; defaults to true
Either the DataSet Metatype or DataSet Int or UUID for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: typeOrId

post.description: Retrieve a list of datasets based on search criteria

Returns JSON converted from the DataSet XML. See the PacBio DataSet XSDs for details

200.description: JSON structure for the given DataSet type (e.g., SubreadSet, ReferenceSet)

get.description: Get a list of Workflow Engine Presets
Get a Workflow Engine Preset by Preset Id
Get a list of job types registered to the SMRT Link System. This can be accessible at job-managers/jobs/{job-type}
Return a list of combined analysis jobs that include analysis,cromwell and multi-analysis type jobs

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Job isActive QueryFilter e.g., 'isActive=true' 'isActive=false'. By default only active (i.e., non-soft-deleted) jobs are returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return (sorted by descending order of ID).  Default = 6000

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: The offset of the number of records to return

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job id Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Job name String QueryFilter e.g., 'alpha' or 'in:alpha,beta'

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Job comments String QueryFilter e.g., 'alpha' or 'in:alpha,beta'

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Job createdAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Job updatedAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: jobUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Job jobUpdatedAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Job path String QueryFilter e.g., '/path/to/jobs/000/000001'.  Note, these need to be URL encoded

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Job createdBy String QueryFilter, e.g. 'Alice' or 'in:Alice,Bob'

parameters.name: parentJobId
parameters.description: Job parentJobId Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

parameters.name: importedAt
parameters.description: Job importedAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: rawText
parameters.description: If defined, this string will be used to perform a case-insensitive full-text search over the JSONified query results

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: Search jobs on the human-readable Application Name that appears in the SMRT Link UI

parameters.name: sortDescending
parameters.description: Sort in descending order; defaults to true

severity.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
severity.title: Severity

updatedAt.description: Time when the Alarm Status was computed
updatedAt.title: Updated At

ListAlarmStatus.description: A List of SMRT Link System Status Instances

entryId.description: Pipeline Entry Point binding id (Example eid_subread)
entryId.title: EntryPoint

fileTypeId.description: File type id for the binding entry point(Example: PacBio.DataSet.SubreadSet)
fileTypeId.title: File Type Id

uuid.description: UUID of Entry Point. This does NOT need to be currently resolvable in the system.
uuid.title: File UUID

DeferredJob.description: A model for creating Deferred jobs that when the entry points all resolvable, the analysis job(s) will be created.

description.description: Description of the Job. This will be used to create the analysis job
description.title: Deferred Analysis Job Description

uuid.description: Optionally Set the UUID of the job that will be created
uuid.title: Job UUID

presetId.description: Workflow Level Options Preset Id (Example: mypreset)
presetId.title: Workflow Preset Id

projectId.description: Associate a Multi-Job with a Project
projectId.title: Project Id

workflowOptions.title: Pipeline Engine options
workflowOptions.description: Pipeline Engine options (May not be used or supported. The System global settings will be used)

AddDeferredJobsOptions.description: Add a list of Child Jobs to a MultiJob. The MultiJob must be in the CREATED state to be editible.

MultiAnalysisJobOptions.description: Multi-Analysis Job creation interface. SMRT Link will poll for the entry points to be resolved, then create the analysis jobs and poll for a terminal state.

projectId.description: Associate a Multi-Job with a Project
projectId.title: Project Id

submit.description: Automatically submit the job upon creation. This will yield the job uneditable.
submit.title: Submit

multiJobFailOnError.title: MultiJob Fail On Error
multiJobFailOnError.description: If enabled, MultiJob fail children jobs on first error.

isNested.title: Nested in SMRT Link UI
isNested.description: If true, job will appear as parent in jobs list

DataSetUpdateRequest.description: Encapsulates multiple independent update parameters, all optional

isActive.description: If False, set dataset to inactive (hidden)
isActive.title: Is active

UserAgreementUpdateRecord.description: Update the configuration (enable install & job metrics) of the user agreement

enableInstallMetrics.title: Enable Install Metrics
enableInstallMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about the SMRT Link installation

enableJobMetrics.title: Enable Job Metrics
enableJobMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about all new and previously run analysis jobs

UserAgreement.description: Record of user agreement to (or rejection of) SMRT Link feedback terms

smrtlinkVersion.title: SMRT Link Version
smrtlinkVersion.description: Version string of SMRT Link to which the agreement applies

osVersion.title: OS Version
osVersion.description: Operating system version of SMRT Link server (determined automatically)

enableInstallMetrics.title: Enable Install Metrics
enableInstallMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about the SMRT Link installation

enableJobMetrics.title: Enable Job Metrics
enableJobMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about all new and previously run analysis jobs

UserAgreementAcceptance.description: Submit user response to agreement for collection of non-proprietary metrics by PacBio Tech Support

enableInstallMetrics.title: Enable Install Metrics
enableInstallMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about the SMRT Link installation. This enables users to trigger Tech Support system status and failed jobs to PacBio.

enableJobMetrics.title: Enable Job Metrics
enableJobMetrics.description: If true, permits collection of non-proprietary information about previously run analysis jobs and newly created analysis jobs to automatically be sent to PacBio upon job completion.

JobTask.description: Holds state of an analysis job task

taskId.title: Task ID
taskId.description: Task ID (unique in the context of a single job)

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: Created at timestamp

CreateJobTaskRecord.description: Request to create a new job task

taskId.title: Task ID
taskId.description: Task ID (unique in the context of a single job)

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: Created at timestamp

UpdateJobTaskRecord.description: Request to update an existing job task

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: Created at timestamp

description.title: Description of the Workflow Engine preset

name.title: Display Name of the Workflow Engine Preset

uuid.title: Barcoded Sample UUID (optional)
uuid.description: Barcoded Sample UUID - will be automatically generated if not defined

sampleData.title: Sample Metadata
sampleData.description: Optional sample metadata, as a JSON object

sampleData.title: Sample Metadata
sampleData.description: Optional sample metadata, as a JSON object

limit.description: The maximum number of datasets returned.  Default = 10000

marker.description: The offset of the number of records to return

id.description: DataSet id Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

name.description: DataSet name String QueryFilter e.g., 'alpha' or 'in:alpha,beta'

path.description: DataSet path String QueryFilter e.g., '/path/to/dataset.xml' or 'in:/alpha.xml,/beta.xml' Note, these need to be URL encoded

numRecords.description: DataSet numRecord Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

totalLength.description: DataSet totalLength Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

version.description: DataSet version String QueryFilter e.g., '3.0.1' or 'in:3.0.1,4.1.0'

createdBy.description: DataSet createdBy String QueryFilter e.g., 'ralph' or 'in:Steve,ralph'

jobId.description: DataSet jobId Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

projectId.description: DataSet projectId Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7'

createdAt.description: DataSet createdAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

updatedAt.description: DataSet createdAt DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

importedAt.description: DataSet imported at DateTime QueryFilter e.g., '2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' or 'gt:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z', 'lte:2018-03-14T00:13:26.693Z' (datetime must be specified using ISO8601 format)

isActive.description: DataSet isActive QueryFilter e.g., 'isActive=true' 'isActive=false'. By default only active (i.e., non-soft-deleted) datasets are returned

parentUuid.description: DataSet Parent UUID Optional QueryFilter e.g., 'bed09210-272b-11e8-b223-e3d877ad877e' or 'in:bed09210-272b-11e8-b223-e3d877ad877e,ca234090-272b-11e8-abef-0773aed21b78' or ?parentUuid=null This will return parent datasets (i.e, no children datasets are returned)

numChildren.description: DataSet numChildren Numeric QueryFilter e.g., '1' or 'in:1,2,3', 'gt:7' Using numChildren=0 will only return Children datasets, whereas numChildren:gt:0 will return only parent datasets

bioSampleName.description: BioSample Name, for subreads and ccsreads only

wellSampleName.description: Well Sample Name, for subreads and ccsreads only

dnaBarcodeName.description: DNA Barcode Name, for subreads and ccsreads only

metadataContextId.description: Movie ID, for subreads and ccsreads only

instrumentName.description: Instrument Name, for subreads and ccsreads only

runName.description: Run Name, for subreads and ccsreads only

cellId.description: Cell ID, for subreads and ccsreads only

createdAt.description: Record creation time

host.title: Host
host.description: IP address or fully-qualified DNS name

force.description: deletes and recreates if entry already exists.

schemeType.description: Scheme type -  srs, rsync, or aws
Scheme type -  srs, rsync, or aws

typeId.title: Notification type
typeId.description: The notification type, ie ERROR, WARNING, or UPDATE

typeId.title: Notification type
typeId.description: The notification type, ie ERROR, WARNING, or UPDATE

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: Created at timestamp

notificationIds.title: Notification Ids
notificationIds.description: List of notification ids to update

path.title: Path
path.description: Path to CSV file (with optional gzip compression)
